UniprotID	Q12905
Accession	Q12905;A6NDB0;B2R8G7;Q5SR10;Q5SR11;Q7L7R3;Q9BWD4;Q9P1N0
EntryName	ILF2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Interleukin enhancer-binding factor 2 (Nuclear factor of activated T-cells 45 kDa)
GeneName	ILF2 NF45 PRO3063
Length	390
Function	Chromatin-interacting protein that forms a stable heterodimer with interleukin enhancer-binding factor 3/ILF3 and plays a role in several biological processes including transcription, innate immunity or cell growth (PubMed:18458058, PubMed:31212927). Essential for the efficient reshuttling of ILF3 (isoform 1 and isoform 2) into the nucleus. Together with ILF3, forms an RNA-binding complex that is required for mitotic progression and cytokinesis by regulating the expression of a cluster of mitotic genes. Mechanistically, competes with STAU1/STAU2-mediated mRNA decay (PubMed:32433969). Also plays a role in the inhibition of various viruses including Japanese encephalitis virus or enterovirus 71.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Nucleolus; Cytoplasm; Nucleus
Disorder	0.8343,0.8375,0.6531,0.6712,0.6851,0.6991,0.7120,0.7250,0.7718,0.7755,0.7843,0.8162,0.7036,0.7036,0.7250,0.5901,0.5098,0.5419,0.5456,0.4541,0.4831,0.3740,0.3840,0.3807,0.2918,0.2164,0.1554,0.1643,0.1349,0.0967,0.0506,0.0618,0.0618,0.0749,0.0719,0.0719,0.1092,0.1791,0.1611,0.1671,0.2541,0.2258,0.2258,0.2164,0.3286,0.3872,0.3872,0.3774,0.3566,0.3948,0.4369,0.5577,0.5382,0.4476,0.4901,0.5296,0.5055,0.5419,0.4766,0.4801,0.4801,0.4409,0.4369,0.4582,0.3774,0.3631,0.3117,0.3215,0.4119,0.4087,0.3215,0.3215,0.3215,0.2470,0.2399,0.2783,0.2609,0.1759,0.1137,0.0929,0.0704,0.0799,0.0967,0.1007,0.0888,0.1501,0.1048,0.1702,0.1528,0.1583,0.1759,0.1942,0.1852,0.1823,0.1791,0.2609,0.2503,0.1554,0.2224,0.3019,0.3631,0.4017,0.3356,0.3426,0.3426,0.4476,0.4369,0.5211,0.4369,0.4979,0.4940,0.3872,0.3872,0.3149,0.2129,0.1969,0.1914,0.1184,0.1206,0.1449,0.1528,0.0929,0.0967,0.0967,0.0605,0.0463,0.0380,0.0223,0.0209,0.0341,0.0405,0.0244,0.0269,0.0463,0.0704,0.0734,0.1206,0.1048,0.1791,0.2680,0.2680,0.2609,0.3631,0.2752,0.2164,0.2951,0.2884,0.2292,0.3215,0.3356,0.3356,0.3494,0.4186,0.3740,0.3740,0.2752,0.3599,0.3599,0.3872,0.3948,0.3494,0.3249,0.2541,0.2364,0.2064,0.2064,0.1184,0.1501,0.2364,0.1583,0.1731,0.1852,0.1914,0.1184,0.2094,0.1914,0.2002,0.2094,0.2436,0.2609,0.1671,0.2002,0.1206,0.1881,0.1137,0.1914,0.2064,0.2193,0.2193,0.2064,0.2503,0.1424,0.1007,0.0749,0.0719,0.0719,0.0749,0.1070,0.1007,0.0433,0.0198,0.0372,0.0405,0.0780,0.0592,0.1070,0.1137,0.1643,0.2503,0.1759,0.1759,0.1399,0.1399,0.0948,0.1137,0.1206,0.0704,0.0690,0.0909,0.0506,0.0967,0.1070,0.0948,0.0414,0.0463,0.0581,0.0281,0.0300,0.0372,0.0209,0.0341,0.0424,0.0341,0.0327,0.0356,0.0389,0.0389,0.0389,0.0398,0.0364,0.0356,0.0287,0.0349,0.0275,0.0618,0.0543,0.0662,0.1349,0.1206,0.1048,0.1942,0.1206,0.0835,0.0948,0.1702,0.1852,0.1501,0.1476,0.2224,0.2193,0.1554,0.1643,0.2002,0.1852,0.1501,0.1206,0.0967,0.0817,0.0483,0.0263,0.0165,0.0165,0.0275,0.0334,0.0389,0.0364,0.0334,0.0424,0.0835,0.1028,0.0662,0.1162,0.1791,0.1759,0.2
